episode.title: Flabbergasting
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Nilay Patel returns to the show to talk about the iPhone XS and XS Max. We got so caught up talking about cameras, we never even mention headphone jacks.
episode.showNotes:
